response.overview: Tanner Hall and Friends take you on a Snowboard adventure of pure powder bliss in Retallack The Movie. Canada's Retallack Lodge has cultivated a unique ski culture, rich in history, salt of the earth characters, and laid back atmosphere. Retallackâ€™s legendary terrain features a wide variety of aspects, elevation, fall line pitch, and pristine backdrops, allowing the film crew to demonstrate what skiing means to them. About Retallack the Lodge: Retallack is located in the heart of the Selkirk Mountains and is renowned as having some of the best ski/snowboard terrain and snow in the world. Retallack receives up to 40 ft of snow per year that blankets their open bowls, glades, and treeskiing runs.
response.title: Retallack: The Movie
